name: Citizen-X: ZEITGEIST
description:
Rogue Elements in the Government are planning to depopulate America with an army of Cloned Agents, GMOs, Chemtrails, Fluoride, Vaccines, Radiation from Fukushima, H.A.A.R.P., Zika, Ebola, Cancer, Aspartame, BPA - YOU NAME IT - But, ONE MAN, Leon Brotherman, has seen enough of the 'DEPOPULATION AGENDA'!!

Citizen-X is MAD AS HELL and he's NOT going to take it anymore!!

There comes a time in every person's life when they must ask themselves: 'What Would Leon Do?'

✔X-Files Meets GTA - The World's 1st Real Conspiracy Game
✔Awesome Action-Packed 1st & 3rd-Person Shooter
✔30 Levels - (So, You Can Fight The Good Fight All Night)
✔10 Weapons
✔Crazy Gadgets, Including A Jetpack
✔In-Game Store - (Full Of Goodies For All The Cash You'll Earn Saving The World)
✔Drive-able Vehicles
✔Destructible Environment - (So, Bring Down The House For More Points)
✔Blast Away Endless Hordes Of Conspirators & Clones

Things have got to change but first, you've gotta get MAD! FREE APP!!

The World's 1st REAL CONSPIRACY GAME!! FREE On Googleplay!!

DOWNLOAD Citizen-X: ZEITGEIST today!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....
